channel.title: OMFG why ? [508]
channel.description:
[b] [size=12pt] why do i get this every time i try to run the 508 client -.-'[/size][/b]
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit. Tryk på en vilkårlig tast for at fortsætte . . .[/code] [b][size=12pt] i've tried to run every 508 client there is, and yes the compileing works fine. got JKD1.6.0_10 & JRE1.6.0_07[/size] [/b]
I'm open for any ideas... :confused: :confused: :|

item.title: OMFG why ? [508]
item.dc:creator: @Armend555 Armend555
item.description:
@Armend555 wrote:

got the cahce in c:/ , dont have another running, and ur code didn’t work

Thx any way[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 04, 2008, 08:24:25 am[/size][hr][br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 04, 2008, 08:30:50 am[/size][hr]How do i do that ?

item.title: OMFG why ? [508]
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

No just means he is trying to run a class that does not exist.

This could be fixed by compiling and making the class, or by putting it in the correct directory.

Read full topic

item.title: OMFG why ? [508]
item.dc:creator: @iluvpie iluvpie
item.description:
@iluvpie wrote:

That means u either: dont have ur 508 cache in ur c:/ drive. 2. you have another 1 running already. or 3. you have wrong code. Try puting this in it. (right click run and click edit)

@echo off cd files Title 508 Client java -Xmx256m client 66 live live software members english game1 pause

Read full topic

item.title: OMFG why ? [508]

item.description:
@Armend555 wrote:


[size=12pt]
why do i get this every time i try to run the 508 client -.-’[/size]

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit. Tryk på en vilkårlig tast for at fortsætte . . .
[size=12pt]
i’ve tried to run every 508 client there is, and yes the compileing works fine. got JKD1.6.0_10 & JRE1.6.0_07[/size]
